war.model

Class Variable

  • java.lang.Object
    • war.model.Variable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbsVariable, AcornSatVariable, BitreVariable, CsiroVariable, EngineeringModelVariable

    @MappedSuperclass
public abstract class Variable
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a climate variable
    Since:
    20th Dec. 2012
    Author:
    Guillaume Prevost
